events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days, and I'm starting to get worried about the delay.
The reported issue regarding the late order delivery has been classified under Delivery Delay to ensure proper routing and handling.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with your delayed shipment and provide relevant updates or solutions.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the issue regarding your delayed order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can look into the status for you?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and the last tracking update was three days ago stating it was in transit at a regional warehouse.

Thank you for the information. I have checked with the shipping carrier, and there is an unexpected delay due to local weather conditions. We expect delivery within the next 3 days, and I'll keep monitoring it for you.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you checking on this and letting me know about the expected timeline.
Your order has been delivered successfully as of this morning, so we are marking this case as resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received your order in good condition and are satisfied with the resolution of the delay issue.
As we have not heard back from you, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding during this delivery delay.
